trial_type.Description: Whether the trial was to match emotion or orientation (=control)

response_accuracy.Description: Whether the response was correct, incorrect, or a miss

response_hand.Description: Which hand was used to respond

gender.LongName: Gender of face images (in case of emotion trial)

ethn_target.Description: Which ethnicity did the target face have?
